ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] What's the proper status code when a PUT fails due to business logic?

Pat Maddox wrote:
>  ...
> I'd really appreciate some insight into which code is the best to use.
> Of course if there's one more suitable than 403 and 409 I'd like to
> know about it.
> ...

Both 403 and 409 will work; you could also consider 422... In the end, I 
don't think it will matter unless you expect generic clients to do 
something with your server...

Best regards, Julian
